00033 class POIInfoData {
00034 public:
00036    typedef uint32 type_t;
00037 
00043    POIInfoData( type_t type, LangType::language_t lang,
00044                 const MC2String& info ):
00045       m_type( type ),
00046       m_lang( lang ),
00047       m_info( info )
00048    { }
00049 
00051    type_t getType() const { return m_type; }
00053    LangTypes::language_t getLang() const { return m_lang; }
00055    const MC2String& getInfo() const { return m_info; }
00056 
00057 private:
00058    type_t m_type; 
00059    LangTypes::language_t m_lang; 
00060    MC2String m_info; 
00061 };

00124    InfoArray findData( POIInfoData::type_t type ) const;
